description: Manage throughput of MongoDB collection under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb collection throughput migrate
commands.summary: Migrate the throughput of the MongoDB collection between autoscale and manually provisioned.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb collection throughput migrate --account-name
                                                  --database-name
                                                  --name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  --throughput-type {autoscale, manual}

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb collection throughput show
commands.summary: Get the throughput of the MongoDB collection under an Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB database.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb collection throughput show --account-name
                                               --database-name
                                               --name
                                               --resource-group

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb collection throughput update
commands.summary: Update the throughput of the MongoDB collection under an Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB database.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb collection throughput update --account-name
                                                 --database-name
                                                 --name
                                                 --resource-group
                                                 [--max-throughput]
                                                 [--throughput]
